Detailed Description

Baseclass for a ReferenceMmi Application.

Parameters:

BOOLEAN AtlApplication::OnMessage (  const Message &  msg  )  [protected, virtual]
 

Handles following messages:

  • Feature, context feature, or property trigger messages
  • UpdateContextItem msg: Feature-using application to supply context item
  • UpdateItem msg: Feature-providing application or plugin to update the state of the item
  • KeyDown message, if softkey codes => Softkey action is executed
    Returns:
    TRUE, if the message has been handled

Reimplemented from Application.

void AtlApplication::OnOpen (   )  [protected, virtual]
 

Is called after the default initialization process.

Reimplemented from Application.

void AtlApplication::OnOpenMenu (  FeatureItemContainer *  item_cont  ) 
 

Parameters:
item_cont Before opening a context menu, the features of the given container must be updated.

BOOLEAN AtlApplication::OnPropertyNotification (  const Property::Notification  notification,
const Property *  property,
const DataItem &  value
)  [virtual]
 

Both application and all attached plugins receive this validation request.

Parameters:
notification Notification rule
  • Notify_Validate_Set - value contains the new value to be set by the property editor
  • Notify_PreviewChanged - value contains the value chosen by the property editor and not yet set
  • Notify_Set - value contains the value set to the property by the property editor
property Property containing the previous value
value Property's new value
Returns:
FALSE, if either application or any plugin does not validate the new value.

BOOLEAN AtlApplication::RouteMessage (  const Message &  msg  )  [protected, virtual]
 

Involves the KeyManager in order to map key codes, before routed according to focus.

Reimplemented from Application.

void AtlApplication::TriggerFeatureItemUpdate (  FeatureItem *  item  ) 
 

Parameters:
item If item is a context feature item with not fixed context, the feature-using application or plugin must be asked to supply the context item. Further, the feature-providing application or plugin is asked to update the state of the item.

BOOLEAN AtlApplication::UpdateItem (  Item *  item  )  [protected, virtual]
 

Parameters:
item The feature-providing application is able to update the state of the item.
Returns:
TRUE, if the item belongs to the application
